salveaflorestamanaos.title: Salve a Floresta Manaós
salveaflorestamanaos.description: The main protected green area in the urban context of Manaus is at risk of having its territory reduced through Bill 582/21. We need to send our message to the mayor David Almeida to veto this setback and save the Forest Manaós!

tavazandogas.title: Tá vazando gás
tavazandogas.description: Rio de Janeiro is the state that most emits greenhouse gases from thermoelectric plants. It has been 7 years since we have had detailed information about these gases, even though by Law 5690/2010 this information should be published every 5 years. Without this data, we cannot reduce the impact of pollution and its consequences on our daily lives. We need the emissions inventory published now!
tavazandogas.navigate: Support the mobilization for the inventory of greenhouse gas emissions!

tiraope.title: Tira o Pé da Minha Serra
tiraope.description: The 2022 mobilization for Serra do Curral made history! And this was only possible because many people acted together. It turns out that the victories were temporary. And now we have an opportunity to consolidate them.

1.title: Amazônia de Pé
1.description: With the advance of the climate crisis and the devastation of the Amazon, it is urgent to act so that the forest can stand. The Amazônia de Pé is a bill of popular initiative that proposes that the public forests of the region are destined to those who historically proved that they know how to preserve the forest: indigenous peoples, quilombolas and conservation units. The future of the forest and life on the planet is in our hands!
1.navigate: Find out how your signature keeps the Amazon forest standing!
